page.title: 15TOURISM
page.content: Stamford is easily reached from most parts of Britain due to its situation near the A1. Many tourists stay in its historical surroundings. They enjoy its Georgian architecture, Burghley house, the ancient churches, Stamford Museum and the Shakespeare open-air plays. Stamford offers good facilities for the tourist- it has several first class hotels, for instance the Lady Anne and the George Hotel, which used to be a coaching inn in the olden days. There are also many private houses which offer B&B accomodation, as well as numerous eating places and public houses. Many visitors are continental or American.
